short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your twitter feed fun and bias-free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Twitter Blind - the Chrome extension that delivers a bias-free social media experience! With Twitter Blind, you can enjoy a more objective feed, free from the influence of user identities. 

Our extension replaces user profiles with random details, revealing the true identity only when you interact with the post. Say goodbye to preconceptions and hello to a refreshing new perspective! Designed to enhance your browsing experience, Twitter Blind optimizes your feed for fun and fairness. 

Surprise yourself and rediscover the joy of social media with Twitter Blind today! ✨

With Twitter Blind, you can:

• Enjoy a more objective social media feed, free from the influence of user identities. Read posts without the bias of who wrote them, promoting fair and unbiased discourse.

• Instantly reveal the identity of users when you interact with their posts (like or retweet).

• Optimize your browsing experience and discover a refreshing new perspective on social media.

Made with ❤️ in Bangalore, India
